text: {"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>In dem Brandmüllerischen Buchladen wird ein <BIBL><TITLE>Project von klugen und verständigen Haus-Vatter, wie auch avelichem Land-Leben</TITLE> von <AUTHOR>Hiorini</AUTHOR>, welches durch Subscriptionen in <VOLUME>2. Folianten</VOLUME> zu <PRIZE>6. fl.</PRIZE> gedrucket wird</BIBL>. Ferner ist allda neu fertig worden: <BIBL><AUTHOR>Lutheri</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Bibel</TITLE> mit Figuren in <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT></BIBL>; Item, <BIBL>des Herrn Abbts <AUTHOR>Fleury</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Kirchen-Historien</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> aus dem frantzösischen ubersetzt</BIBL>; Item, <BIBL><TITLE>die gantze Pflicht des Menschen</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> aus dem Englischen ubersetzt</BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":8,"explanation":"The XML contained numerous character encoding errors (e.g., sequences like '\\u221a\\u00bb' for umlauts, '\\u221a\\u2020' for 'zu', and corrupted characters in 'Haus-Vatter' and 'neu') which were corrected to standard German spelling. Structurally, the first bibliographic entry had overlapping and incorrectly nested <TITLE> and <AUTHOR> tags, which were reorganized to properly enclose the full title and attribute the author. Additionally, the third bibliographic item (Fleury's work) was missing its surrounding <BIBL> tags, which were added."}

parsed.fixed_xml: <ITEM>In dem Brandmüllerischen Buchladen wird ein <BIBL><TITLE>Project von klugen und verständigen Haus-Vatter, wie auch avelichem Land-Leben</TITLE> von <AUTHOR>Hiorini</AUTHOR>, welches durch Subscriptionen in <VOLUME>2. Folianten</VOLUME> zu <PRIZE>6. fl.</PRIZE> gedrucket wird</BIBL>. Ferner ist allda neu fertig worden: <BIBL><AUTHOR>Lutheri</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Bibel</TITLE> mit Figuren in <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT></BIBL>; Item, <BIBL>des Herrn Abbts <AUTHOR>Fleury</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Kirchen-Historien</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> aus dem frantzösischen ubersetzt</BIBL>; Item, <BIBL><TITLE>die gantze Pflicht des Menschen</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> aus dem Englischen ubersetzt</BIBL></ITEM>
parsed.explanation: The XML contained numerous character encoding errors (e.g., sequences like '\u221a\u00bb' for umlauts, '\u221a\u2020' for 'zu', and corrupted characters in 'Haus-Vatter' and 'neu') which were corrected to standard German spelling. Structurally, the first bibliographic entry had overlapping and incorrectly nested <TITLE> and <AUTHOR> tags, which were reorganized to properly enclose the full title and attribute the author. Additionally, the third bibliographic item (Fleury's work) was missing its surrounding <BIBL> tags, which were added.
